name: Windblume Ode
description: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.

passiveDescription.0: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by <cryo>16%</cryo> for 6s.
passiveDescription.1: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by <cryo>20%</cryo> for 6s.
passiveDescription.2: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by <cryo>24%</cryo> for 6s.
passiveDescription.3: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by <cryo>28%</cryo> for 6s.
passiveDescription.4: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by <cryo>32%</cryo> for 6s.
